boardgame.name: Space Hulk (third edition)
Space Hulk: 20th Anniversary Edition
boardgame.description: From the depths of space an ancient vessel drifts slowly towards the Imperium of Mankind - a space hulk. Within its confines, untold thousands of Genestealers slowly emerge from hibernation. The Space Marines must enter the cramped corridors and tomb-like chambers of the ancient ship to defeat this alien menace._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Space Hulk is a board game for two players, recreating the battles fought between the Space Marines and Genestealers. One player commands the Space Marines as they carry out deadly missions in the ancient Space Hulk, and the other commands the horde of Genestealers opposing them. Space Hulk's fast-paced rules simulate the tense atmosphere of a mission deep inside the cramped confines of a derelict space hulk, where split-second decisions are needed for victory._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: #6: Space Hulk and New Year_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Resolutions

New, still sealed. Shipping within the U.S. will be $15. International shipping will vary. Please contact me for shipping quote. It is a heavy box, weighing nearly 5 kilograms, so shipping may be substantial. However, if you want less shipping, I am willing to open the box and punch the tiles. This will remove around 1 kg of material and will reduce shipping costs. I will not remove any of the plastic pieces from their sprues. If you have any questions, please let me know. Thanks.

Please wait for me to send you an invoice before you send funds via PayPal. Note the costs below are only for the United States. International shipping will be substantially higher! This item is for WestonTheFox only. Conditions: You_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll have to open the box, and examine the contents (though you won_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have to punch anything or clip anything off spurs). This is to ease my mind that this will become a playing copy. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m actually doing this for another reason as well. There have been threads here on BGG with incidents of misprintings of the game (some tokens with blank sides). I want to be certain this is not one of those copies (as I have no idea myself). If this is a bad copy, you will not be obligated to make the purchase. Otherwise, the sale is final. With that condition in mind, the sale will have to take place locally in a public location (on which we have agreed).

Near mint. Shrink removed, contents verified complete, nothing removed from sprue. Rulebooks placed in ziploc bags. To be safe I have requested a replacement part from GW UK (GW US didn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have it). If they provide the part I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll include it (seems obvious I know :)). Shipping Insurance for $175 value highly recommended with purchase. From the depths of space an ancient vessel drifts slowly towards the Imperium of Mankind - a space hulk. Within its confines, untold thousands of Genestealers slowly emerge from hibernation. The Space Marines must enter the cramped corridors and tomb-like chambers of the ancient ship to defeat this alien menace. Space Hulk is a board game for two players, recreating the battles fought between the Space Marines and Genestealers. One player commands the Space Marines as they carry out deadly missions in the ancient Space Hulk, and the other commands the horde of Genestealers opposing them. Space Hulk_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s fast-paced rules simulate the tense atmosphere of a mission deep inside the cramped confines of a derelict space hulk, where split-second decisions are needed for victory.

Ok so I have played this game once. It is in great condition. See Photos Here: https://boardgamegeek.com/image/2432642/saca-muela https://boardgamegeek.com/image/2432643/saca-muela Good News: 1)The game comes with Battlefoam Photo here: https://boardgamegeek.com/image/2432643/saca-muela 2) The price is cheap The bad news: 1) There is a fourth edition - I have heard some say they like the third edition rules better though. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not familiar with the nuances. 2) The only cosmetic problem with it is the eagle on one dude_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s head is broken. I have glued it on a few times but it comes off easily (dumb design) also I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m not sure about the robot tractor claw thing. I think I cut it right from the sprue but for some reason in the back of my mind I think I may have cut off part of it that looked like it was part sprue but it was not. Here is a photo: https://boardgamegeek.com/image/2432644/saca-muela As far as I can remember and see, this is the only cosmetic concern with the game None of these things affect game play. Thanks for looking!
